content.text: Match ends, West Bromwich Albion 1, Southampton 2.
Second Half ends, West Bromwich Albion 1, Southampton 2.
Attempt missed. Jonny Evans (West Bromwich Albion) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the right following a corner.
Corner,  West Bromwich Albion. Conceded by Josh Sims.
Attempt saved. James Ward-Prowse (Southampton) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Josh Sims.
Attempt missed. Ahmed Hegazi (West Bromwich Albion) right footed shot from more than 35 yards is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Salomón Rondón following a set piece situation.
Hand ball by Oriol Romeu (Southampton).
Substitution, West Bromwich Albion. Oliver Burke replaces Matt Phillips.
Ryan Bertrand (Southampton) wins a free kick on the left wing.
